name: Tonight
detailedForecast: Snow before midnight, then a chance of snow and patchy freezing fog between midnight and 1am, then patchy freezing fog and rain and snow between 1am and 3am, then patchy fog and a chance of rain and snow between 3am and 4am, then rain likely and patchy fog between 4am and 5am, then patchy fog and rain and snow likely. Cloudy, with a low around 17. North wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
